item.title: Trainer admitted to 'sexually relieving' dolphin who 'fell in love' with her during NASA-funded experiment - UNILAD
item.description:
1. Trainer admitted to 'sexually relieving' dolphin who 'fell in love' with her during NASA-funded experiment  UNILAD
  2. Dolphin takes its own life after developing a deep bond with its trainer in a NASA experiment  The Times of India
  3. Can a dolphin fall in love with a human? NASA’s scandalous 1960s experiment resurfaces with shocking detai  The Economic Times
  4. Inside the NASA-funded experiment that went tragically wrong after dolphin fell in love with his trainer  Daily Mail
  5. The dolphin who committed suicide after falling in love with its trainer: NASA experiment gone wrong  The Economic Times
